name: Razorback Crab
description: The Razorback Crab features a distinctive spiky shell and aggressive physical attacks, allowing it to control the battlefield effectively.
memorable: Its Bladed Shell inflicts slashing damage on contact, deterring close attacks.
goals: To defend its territory and grapple potential threats.
relations: May be found alongside other aquatic creatures or as a predator to smaller marine life.
environment: Coastal areas, beaches, or areas near freshwater sources.
strengths: High Armor Class and notable grappling abilities make it a formidable opponent in melee combat.
weaknesses: Lacks mobility options and has low intelligence, making it predictable in battle.
attacks: Uses multiattack to combine Claw and Shell Bash attacks, grappling foes with powerful claws.
most_powerful_ability: The Bladed Shell feature inflicts damage when enemies engage it in melee.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect nearby movement.
skills: Has average perception skills, giving it basic awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can knock opponents prone with its Pounce ability.
Utilizes grappling as a strategy to control combat.
Physical attacks include bludgeoning and slashing damage.
Good durability due to strong Constitution.
No special magical abilities or spells.
